gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 Fury Series (FIJI, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.11-041811-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Solid 60 fps in most areas except very few area that performance impacted little.  Other than that, it's excellent performance with custom graphic settings after updated to Mesa 18.2.1, not only that but also fixed the frozen issue that happened to the previous mesa driver.

title: Wolfenstein: The New Order

gpu: NVIDIA Corporation GeForce GTX 1060 6GB/PCIe/SSE2
notes:
Audio levels are messed, audio settings don't work.
Fixed it with https://github.com/Sirmentio/protontricks. Install it, protontricks <appid> winecfg then add xaudio2_7 to the libaries, native, builtin (should be default). Fixed it for me.
